      • roomsIdToString

        public java.lang.String[] roomsIdToString()
        Description of the method roomsIdToString. We recover all the keys of the map room in a Set. Then we cast the set in an array of String.
        Returns:
        String array (content : ID of the rooms)

      • roomsToString

        public java.lang.String[] roomsToString()
        Description of the method roomsToString. We browse all the map rooms to see the values of each Room and we put the informations into an array of String (thanks to the function toString() of Room)
        Returns:
        String array (content : ID of the rooms + capacity)

      • timeTablesIDToString

        public java.lang.String[] timeTablesIDToString()
        Description of the method timeTablesIDToString. We recover all the keys of the map timeTable in a Set. Then we cast the set in an array of String.
        Returns:
        String array (content : ID of the timeTable)

      • booksIdToString

        public java.lang.String[] booksIdToString(java.lang.Integer timeTableId)
        Description of the method booksIdToString. We get the timeTable matching with the ID. Then we use the function getBookingsId of timeTable to return a String Array containing the BooksId.
        Parameters:
        timeTableId -
        Returns:
        String array (content : booksId)

      • addRoom

        public java.lang.Boolean addRoom(java.lang.Integer roomId,
                                 java.lang.Integer capacity)
        Description of the method addRoom. We check if the room we want to add already exists or not. If the room does not exist we add it to the map.
        Parameters:
        roomId - (Integer)
        capacity - (Integer)
        Returns:
        Boolean (true if the room is correctly added, false if the room already exist)
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • removeRoom

        public java.lang.Boolean removeRoom(int roomId)
        Description of the method removeRoom. We check if the room we want to remove exists or not. If the room exists we remove it from the map.
        Parameters:
        roomId - (Integer)
        Returns:
        Boolean ( true if the room is correctly removed, false if the room does not exist)

      • getRoom

        public java.lang.Integer getRoom(int timeTableId,
                                 int bookId)
        Description of the method getRoom. We get the timeTable matching with the ID. Then we use functions existing in Room to return the Room Id.
        Parameters:
        timeTableId - (Integer)
        bookId - (Integer)
        Returns:
        Id of the Room we search (Integer)
